# **name**

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property   | Attribute  | Description          | Type                                     | Default     |
| ---------- | ---------- | -------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `active`   | `active`   | Active tab boolean   | `boolean`                                | `undefined` |
| `disabled` | `disabled` | Disabled tab boolean | `boolean`                                | `undefined` |
| `level`    | `level`    | Title level          | `"1" \| "2" \| "3" \| "4" \| "5" \| "6"` | `'1'`       |


## Slots

| Slot        | Description                                                                                       |
| ----------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"amount"`  | Provide a `sbb-tab-amount` to show an amount to the right of the title.                           |
| `"icon"`    | Use this slot to display an icon to the left of the title, by providing the `sbb-icon` component. |
| `"unnamed"` | This slot will show the provided tab title.                                                       |
